text: Rubén Tierrablanca González (24 August 1952 - 23 December 2020) was a Mexican- born Turkish Roman Catholic bishop. Tierrablanca González was born in Guanajuato, Mexico. He became a priest in 1978. He was titular bishop of Tubernuca and as Vicar Apostolic of Apostolic Vicariate of Istanbul and Apostolic Administrator of Greek Catholic Apostolic Exarchate of Istanbul, from 2016 until his death in office in 2020.Apostolic Vicariate of Istanbul Tierrablanca Gonzalez died in Istanbul, Turkey at age 68, from COVID-19 in Istanbul, Turkey.Bishop Rubén Tierrablanca, man of dialogue, dies from COVID-19 in Istanbul ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Istanbul Category:Turkish Christian clergy Category:People from Guanajuato (state) Category:Roman Catholic bishops Category:Mexican Roman Catholic priests
